2053520.name: Condenser: A Game Developer's Research Tool
2053520.description:
Savvy developers do competitive research.

Condenser is a collection of small tools that is designed to automate the toil out of researching games on the most popular platforms, allowing you to quickly draw insights and get back to developing your own project.

Fundamentally- Condenser is a tool that helps you sell the things you are building.

Easy to Use

Boot the tool, paste in some Steam URLs, and you're going! Condenser will take those URLs and bring you back the information you need to make smart decisions about how to market your own game.

Detailed Comparison

Critical information about each target game in an easily comparable format:

  • Price information

  • User Tags

  • Genres

  • Localization 

  • Follower Count

  • Top Positive and Negative Reviews

  • Capsule Images

Streamlined Tracking and Sharing

  • Condenser results are returned as either a CSV or a formatted report.

  • Set up automatic wishlist and review monitoring for your own titles.

  • Automatically share Comp results or regular tracking to the project management tools you already use like Slack and Teams.
